Summary Note:

Occupation History:
Having worked for over 42 years, Mayer Weber Schulz brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Mayer Weber Schulz launched his career as a Aerospace Engineer at RUAG Aerospace Services GmbH, where he gained valuable experience from 1983 to 1986.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Program Manager at Liebherr-Aerospace GmbH in 1987, further expanding his skill set.
